Posts.EditableText: I've tried to download some of the text adventures, but it won't let me download them. I'll click the download button, then it'll load like it trying to download, and nothing happens. Is this a me problem, and if it is, how do I fix it?
Posts.HTML: I've tried to download some of the text adventures, but it won't let me download them. I'll click the download button, then it'll load like it trying to download, and nothing happens. Is this a me problem, and if it is, how do I fix it?

Posts.EditableText: Not sure but... could it be a firewall or download problem on your PC?  You may have to enable downloads from this site.  Someone far smarter than I will probably be along in a bit to proffer better advice.
